post.summary: Provides security extract information related to analyses.
Given a valid ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.UserWhatIfAnalysisRequest request, queries the database to  retrieve the rule violations the what-if scenario described would produce.
Endpoint for executing drill down requests. Drill down gives details regarding how a rule has been violated.
Endpoint for executing drill down requests. Drill down gives details regarding how a rule has been violated.

get.summary: Gets an Analysis, based on the supplied !:securityExtractId and !:rulebookId parameters.

parameters.name: securityExtractId
parameters.description: Represents the security extract unique identifier which is used to obtain the Analysis.

parameters.name: rulebookId
parameters.description: Represents the rule book unique identifier which is used to obtain the Analysis.

get.summary: Gets an Security Extract, based on the supplied externalReference parameter.

parameters.name: externalReference
parameters.description: Represents the unique external reference which is used to obtain the Security Extract.

get.summary: Gets a Security Extract based on the supplied security extract id.

parameters.name: securityExtractId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the security extract.

get.summary: Gets an odata list of offline business process conflict summary items, based on the supplied parameters.

parameters.name: analysisId
parameters.description: Represents the unique analysis identifier.

get.summary: Gets a list of user summary items, based on the supplied parameters.

parameters.name: analysisId
parameters.description: Represents the unique analysis identifier.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Represents the optional parameter which specifies how many items will be bypassed.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Represents the optional parameter which specifies how many items to returned.

post.summary: Onboards a new account so that rulebooks and extracts can be added to it.
Updates the rulebook of an onboarded account, and kicks off an analysis workflow.
Updates the security extract of an onboarded account, and kicks off an analysis workflow.

file.description: Security extract file. MUST be zipped.

post.summary: Queues a new analysis job in the service bus.
Queues up a full conflict matrix generation of the specified hit analysis.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Use.description: Model for a single user what-if realtime analysis request.  See ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.UserWhatIfAnalysisResponse for  the response model.

accountId.description: Reference to the account that the what-if analysis should use.  Account Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

systemId.description: Reference to the system id that the analysis is running against.  System Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

username.description: Username to analyze the role changes against.

rolesToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

rolesToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

groupsToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

groupsToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Use.description: Model for a single user what-if realtime analysis response.  See ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.UserWhatIfAnalysisRequest for the  request model.

isSuperUser.description: TRUE if user has access to everything in the system or is a 'SuperUser'.

extractTimestampUtc.description: The timestamp of the security extract used in the analysis.

rulebookTimestampUtc.description: The timestamp of the rulebook version used in the analysis.

ruleViolations.description: The list of rule violations the requested combination generated.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Rul.description: Represents an identified rule violation based upon the rulebook.

ruleName.description: The name of the rule that's been violated.

ruleDescription.description: The description of the rule that's been violated.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Dri.description: Model for a drill down request.

accountId.description: Reference to the account that the what-if analysis should use.  Account Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

systemId.description: Reference to the system id that the analysis is running against.  System Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

username.description: Username to analyze the role changes against.

ruleId.description: Rule ID to execute drill down on.

rolesToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

rolesToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

groupsToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

groupsToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Dri.description: Represents a response to a Drill Down request. See ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.DrillDown.DrillDownRequest

extractTimestampUtc.description: The timestamp of the security extract used in the analysis.

rulebookTimestampUtc.description: The timestamp of the rulebook version used in the analysis.

drillDownBusinessFunctionHits.description: A collection of business function hits with the details of how a particular permission was hit.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Dri.description: Used to represent a business function hit on a drill down request

permissionHits.description: Permission hits associated to this business function hit.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Dri.description: Represents a permission hit on a drill down request

isUserHit.description: TRUE if hit comes from UserToPermissions table. Indicates a direct hit on the user

isRoleHit.description: TRUE if hit comes from RoleToPermissions table. Indicates a hit on a role that is assigned to the user

roleName.description: Name of the role that caused the hit.

isGroupHit.description: TRUE if hit comes from GroupToPermissions table. Indicates a hit on a group that is assigned to the user (or to a role)

hitGroupName.description: Name of the group that caused the hit.

groupComesFromRole.description: TRUE if the group is assigned to a role that is assigned to the user, FALSE if direct link between user and group.

groupRoleName.description: Name of the role the group is assigned to

accountId.description: Reference to the account that the what-if analysis should use.  Account Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

systemId.description: Reference to the system id that the analysis is running against.  System Id must already be  examined to verify tenancy and access rights.

username.description: Username to analyze the role changes against.

ruleIds.description: Rule IDs to execute drill down on.

rolesToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

rolesToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

groupsToAdd.description: List of roles to add for what-if analysis

groupsToRemove.description: List of roles to remove for what-if analysis

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Ana.description: Serves as the model for the Analysis.

id.description: Represents the required unique Analysis identifier.

extractId.description: Represents the required Security Extract identifier.

createdTimestampUtc.description: Represents the required Date/Time when the Analysis was created as a UTC.

createdBy.description: Represents the required user who created the Analysis.

completedTimestampUtc.description: Represents the optional Date/Time when the Analysis was updated as a UTC.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Off.description: Represents the summary of the user conflict data, by business process.

ruleCode.description: Represents the identifier of the risk (rule), which makes up the group of  risk being summarized in the business process conflict summary.

riskRating.description: Represents the rating of risk (rule) involved in the business process conflict.  Typical values are: Informational, Low, Medium, High and Critical.

ruleName.description: Represents the descriptive name of risk (rule) involved in the business process conflict.

ruleBusinessProcess.description: Represents the root level business process of the risk (rule).

userId.description: Represents the unique identifier of user involved in the conflict.

fullName.description: Represents the full name of the user involved in the conflict.

businessFunctionName1.description: Represents the comma delimited list of one or more business functions that make up the risk (rule).

highestLevelOfFullyExecutedRisks.description: Represent the highest level of fully executed risks.

highestLevelOfFullyExecutedUnmitigatedRi.description: Represents the highest level of utilization fully-executed unmitigated risks.

highestLevelOfRisks.description: Represents the highest level of risks.

highestLevelOfUnmitigatedRisk.description: Represents the highest level of unmitigated risks.

highImpactRecommendationCount.description: Represents the highest impact recommendation count.

numberOfAssignedDirectProfiles.description: Represents the number of assigned direct profiles.

numberOfAssignedRoles.description: Represents the number of roles assigned to the user.

numberOfFullyExecutedCriticalOrHighRisks.description: Represents the number of fully-executed utilization critical or high risks.

numberOfFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: Represents the number of other utilization fully-executed risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedCriticalOrHighRi.description: Represents the number of not fully-executed utilization critical or high risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: Represents the number of other not utilization fully-executed risks.

totalNumberOfRisks.description: Represents the total number of risks, which is the count of the distinct rule codes in a business process conflict summary.

totalNumberOfUnmitigatedRisks.description: Represents the total number of unmitigated risks.

totalRecommendationCount.description: Represents the total count of recommendations.

userGroup.description: Represents the name of the group that the user belongs to.

username.description: Represents the user name of the user summary.

custom01.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom02.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom03.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom04.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom05.description: Any custom value related to user.

numberOfUsersAssigned.description: Represents the number of assigned users.

numberOfNotUsedSensitiveTcodes.description: Represents the number of not used sensitive TCodes.

numberOfNotUsedNonSensitiveTcodes.description: Represents the number of not used non-sensitive TCodes.

numberOfUsersNotUsingRole.description: Represents the number of users which are not using in role.

numberOfCriticalAndHighRisks.description: Represents the number of critical and high risks.

numberOfOtherRisks.description: Represents the number of other risks.

numberOfCompositeRoleMembership.description: Represents the number of composite role membership.

numberOfDerivedChildren.description: Represents the number of derived children.

numberOfFullyExecutedCriticalOrHighRisks.description: Represents the number of fully executed critical or high risks.

numberOfFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: Represents the number of fully executed other risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedCriticalHighRisk.description: Represents the number of not fully executed critical and high risks.

numberOfNotFullyExecutedOtherRisks.description: Represents the number of not fully executed other risks.

highestLevelOfFullyExecutedRisks.description: Represents the highest level of fully executed risks.

highestLevelOfRisks.description: Represents the highest level of risks.

highImpactRecommendationCount.description: Represents the count of high impact recomendations.

totalRecommendationCount.description: Represents the count of total recommendations.

id.description: Represents the user risk summary unique identifier.

riskRating.description: Represents the rule risk rating.  E.g.: Critical, High, Low, etc.

ruleType.description: Represents the rule type.  E.g.: SOD, SEN.

businessFunctionCodes.description: Represents a comma separated list of business function codes associated with the rule.

critical.description: Represents the count of critical risks.

high.description: Represents the count of high risks.

other.description: Represents the count of other risks.

activeUserCount.description: Represents the count of active users.

userWeightedRiskRank.description: Represents the user weighted risk rank.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Onl.description: Serves as the item which determines if a role is assigned to a user and if the  assignment has been used.

userName.description: Represents the user name of the user associated with the remediation.

userGroup.description: Represents the group of the user associated with the remediation.

role.description: Represents the role of the remediation.

recommendation.description: Represents the recommendation of the remediation.

difficulty.description: Represents the difficulty level of the remediation.

impact.description: Represents the impact of the remediation.

highOrCriticalRiskCount.description: Represents the high or critical risk count of the remediation.

otherRiskCount.description: Represents the other risk count of the remediation.

totalRiskCount.description: Represents the total risk count of the remediation.

custom01.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom02.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom03.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom04.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom05.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom01.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom02.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom03.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom04.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom05.description: Any custom value related to user.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Onl.description: Represents the business process conflict summary.

ruleBusinessProcess.description: Represents the business process of rule.

fullName.description: Represents the full name of user.

businessFunctionCode1.description: Represents the code of first business function.

businessFunctionName1.description: Represents the name of first business function.

businessFunctionBusinessProcess1.description: Represents the business process of first business function.

stadUtilizationCount1.description: Represents the count of first STAD utilization.

cdhdrposUtilizationCount1.description: Represents the count of first CDHDRPOS utilization.

businessFunctionCode2.description: Represents the code of second business function.

businessFunctionName2.description: Represents the name of second business function.

businessFunctionBusinessProcess2.description: Represents the business process of second business function.

stadUtilizationCount2.description: Represents the count of second STAD utilization.

cdhdrposUtilizationCount2.description: Represents the count of second CDHDRPOS utilization.

businessFunctionCode3.description: Represents the code of third business function.

businessFunctionName3.description: Represents the name of third business function.

businessFunctionBusinessProcess3.description: Represents the business process of third business function.

stadUtilizationCount3.description: Represents the count of third STAD utilization.

cdhdrposUtilizationCount3.description: Represents the count of third CDHDRPOS utilization.

businessFunctionCode4.description: Represents the code of fourth business function.

businessFunctionName4.description: Represents the name of fourth business function.

businessFunctionBusinessProcess4.description: Represents the business process of fourth business function.

stadUtilizationCount4.description: Represents the count of fourth STAD utilization.

cdhdrposUtilizationCount4.description: Represents the count of fourth CDHDRPOS utilization.

businessFunctionCode5.description: Represents the code of fifth business function.

businessFunctionName5.description: Represents the name of fifth business function.

businessFunctionBusinessProcess5.description: Represents the business process of fifth business function.

stadUtilizationCount5.description: Represents the count of fifth STAD utilization.

cdhdrposUtilizationCount5.description: Represents the count of fifth CDHDRPOS utilization.

userCount.description: Represents the aggregated count of users involved in the conflict.

custom01.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom02.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom03.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom04.description: Any custom value related to user.

custom05.description: Any custom value related to user.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Onl.description: Provides detail information about a role.

system.description: Represents the name of the system instance analyzed.

roleName.description: Represents the name of the role analyzed.

roleDescription.description: Represents the description of the role.

permission.description: Represents the technical StringValue field in the db of the permission identified as a function hit.

permissionName.description: Represents the permission text value as seen in the user interface.

authorization.description: Represents the permission level. Examples include: Read, Write, Edit, Delete, etc.

executionCount.description: Represents the count of instances of record changes.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Onl.description: Represents an actual Hit of an analysis, with information about the  permission owner, the target, the risk, the business function,  the permission, and the permission group

userName.description: Name of the user that owns the permission

permission.description: Represents the technical StringValue field in the db of the permission identified as a function hit

isSuperAdmin.description: Determines if role is for super admin.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Sco.description: Model that represents the different Hits and affected scopes that a user has for a particular risk

businessFunctionHits.description: Amount of BusinessFunction hits for the current user and risk

permissionGroupHits.description: Amount of PermissionGroup hits for the current user and risk

permissionHits.description: Amount of Permission hits for the current user and risk

impactedScopes.description: Amount of impacted scopes for the current user and risk

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Sco.description: Represents an actual Hit of an analysis, with information about the  permission owner, the risk, the business function,  the permission, and the permission group

userName.description: Name of the user that owns the permission

businessFunctionReference.description: Natural Key for the Business Function

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Sco.description: Represents an actual Hit of an analysis, with information about the  permission owner, the target, the risk, the business function,  the permission, and the permission group

userName.description: Name of the user that owns the permission

businessFunctionReference.description: Natural Key for the Business Function

scopeValue.description: Natural Key for the Affected Target

isSuperAdmin.description: Determines if user is super admin.

accountId.description: Reference to the account for the system that is going to be associated

accountName.description: Reference to the account name for the system that is going to be associated.

systemId.description: Reference to the MultiSystem that is going to be part to the onboarding process.

systemName.description: Reference to the MultiSystem name that is going to be part to the onboarding process.

systemDescription.description: Reference to the MultiSystem extra information for the system that is going to be part to the onboarding process.

ErpMaestro.ErpAnalysis.Common.Models.Que.description: Model for kicking off a report analysis.  The hit analysis must already be complete by this point.
